Alhambra.The Bunny Museum: The Bunny Museum is a world record-holding museum dedicated to rabbits that was opened to the public in 1998, located in Altadena, California, US. The museum currently holds more than 33,000 bunny-related items. Located in a residential neighborhood, entrance is by appointment and donation only. The museum is extremely eclectic and bizarre, holding every type of bunny replica imagined.
